title: 3hr 40min powercut approved for tomorrow
body_lines: The power cut schedule for tomorrow (17) for three hour and forty minutes was announced today, the Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) said.
They said the approval for tomorrow's power shedding was granted following a request from the Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB).

Accordingly, power shedding will be imposed in the areas that come under A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J, K, L, P, Q, R, S, T, U, V and W category, for two hour from 9.00 am to 5.00 pm and 1hour and 40 minutes from 5.00 pm to 8.00 pm.
The PUCSL regrets the inconvenience caused to its consumers due to prevailing power cuts. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
